text: By the end of the month he still delighted in Naples. He told Cloncurry that he enjoyed it as much as his health permitted him to enjoy anything. 'The Pearl, he wrote,'is arrived, which is a great resource. Vesuvius seems to be tired; he is going out fast.... What a gay, lively people, and what a busy town. At Rome, every other man was a priest: here the priest is superceded by the soldier - a favourable change in my eye, particularly as the troops are very fine.
